Title: Space Jam 2
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Sport
Writer: Tex Avery (characters), Alfredo Botello (screenplay), Andrew Dodge (screenplay), Willie Ebersol (screenplay), Chuck Jones (characters), Justin Lin (screenplay)
Actors: Don Cheadle, Sonequa Martin-Green, Cassandra Starr, Greice Santo
Plot: NBA superstar LeBron James teams up with Bugs Bunny and the rest of the Looney Tunes for this long-awaited sequel.
